attributes.action: Open up the bus lane on Jamaica Road in SE London for normal traffic.
attributes.background: Tower Bridge closed on 01 Oct 2016 for 3 months causing traffic on other routes. Jamaica Road is suffering the consequences as it leads to Rotherhithe Tunnel. The road has a 24 hr bus lane, which is barely used, causing more traffic. Opening up bus lane to normal traffic will ease pressure.

rejection.details: Bus lanes in London are the responsibility of Transport for London. You might like to contact them with your suggestion. Their contact details can be found here: https://tfl.gov.uk/help-and-contact/
